name: Stars collector: shoot in the blackhole
name_original: Stars collector: shoot in the blackhole
description:
Stars collector: the best space shooting arcade game. Simple mechanics, very addictive. Shoot your planet into the blackhole and collect the stars.

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new planets!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Stars collector is completely free to play! Collect all the stars!
WHAT'S NEW
Hello space explorers! This one is a bigger than a star! A new update with a lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
